info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:18PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A line of showers with isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of Lewis and Clark, west central Broadwater, northwestern Meagher, northwestern Madison, northeastern Beaverhead, Jefferson and southwestern Cascade Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 617 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Lincoln to 11 miles northwest of Helena to 9 miles southwest of Twin Bridges. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, Sheridan, Lincoln, East Helena, Whitehall, Twin Bridges, Montana City, Basin, Silver Star, Wolf Creek, York, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Waterloo, Cardwell and Clancy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
